titleStmt.title: Wee the knights, gentlemen, ministers, and free-holders of the county of Warwick being deeply affected with, and sadly sensible of the present miseries,...

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. L. at the White Lyon in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Concerning payment of taxes imposed by Parliament, support for a general act of oblivion, and payment of arrears due to soldiers.
Title from first 4 lines of text.
At end, "Subscribed in many thousand hands." in square brackets.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the White Lyon in St. Pauls Church-yard
